alert.note: Alert for Greene (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 04 at 1:18AM CST until January 04 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON AND CENTRAL GREENE COUNTIES... At 118 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of State Line to 10 miles southwest of Fruitdale to near Leakesville to 8 miles southeast of McLain, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Leakesville, Deer Park and Fruitdale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
